price: 79. Boye bozali kornona te ete! Ba ndeke baye bazali kopumbwa o likolo, eloko ya kosimba bango ezali te sé Allah? Ya sólo, wana ezali elembo mpo bato bakoka kondima.
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ مُسَخَّرَٰتٖ فِي جَوِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw ilā al-ṭayri musakharātin fī jawwi al-samāi mā yum'sikuhunna illā al-lahu inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
